title: Dungeons and Dragons Anthology The Master Collection
description:
Title: Dungeons & Dragons Anthology: The Master Collection
Genre: RPG / fantasy / isometric
Released: 15th November 2011
Developer: BioWare / Black Isle Studios / Troika Games
Publisher: Atari
Description:
The Dungeons & Dragons Anthology packages six of the most beloved classic RPG video games of the Dungeons & Dragons franchise and their expansions into a single edition - the ultimate RPG package for the ultimate D&D fan. Bundle includes: Baldur's Gate 1 & 2 + expansions, Icewind Dale 1 & 2 + expansions, Planescape: Torment and The Temple of Elemental Evil.

How to play:
1) Run Setup.msi and install the games you want;
2) Launch the games using their main executables or shortcuts (DRM free).

If you like this bundle, BUY it!
